articles.title: Forget foldable TVs. Transparent screens are the cool new tech trend - CNN
articles.description: TVs seem to get bigger, slimmer and more connected each year. But now, in 2021, you can also see right through them.
articles.content:
(CNN Business)TVs seem to get bigger, slimmer and more connected each year. But now, in 2021, you can also see right through them.
